title: 30 Ways to Eat a Tomato
description: Tomato is a fruit! One of the most famous in the world. The Mediterranean cuisine adores tomatoes. Cooked baked, roasted, dried, raw..., there are so many ways to eat a tomato and perhaps many others you haven't even think of. One thing is certain: The tomato is delicious, healthy, with a cheerful red color! Enjoy it!"30 Ways to Eat a Tomato" offers several different ways to cook and eat tomatoes. It is illustrated with colourful, authentic images, to enhance your creativity while you are cooking!
author: Evelyn and Sotiris
